text: Stephen Rex Porter (1931-2003), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the pole vault at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. Four years later he competed in the pole vault again at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Australia. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2003 deaths Category:English male pole vaulters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Rex Porter
